entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h then light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
